remarks: Virtual deduction generalizing rule for 2 quantifying variables and 2 virtual hypothesis.  (Contributed by Alan Sare, 25-Jul-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
gen22.1 $e |- (. ph ,. ps ->. ch ). $.
gen22 $p |- (. ph ,. ps ->. A. x A. y ch ). $.
$d ph x $.
$d ph y $.
$d ps x $.
$d ps y $.
